title: Secrets Of Bones - E01 to 05 - Documentary - Nature - Slimoo
description:
Secrets Of Bones - Documentary - Nature - Xvid - Slimoo
 
 


 
Evolutionary biologist and master skeleton builder Ben Garrod presents a six-part series looking at how bones have enabled vertebrates to colonise and dominate practically every habitat on Earth.
 
 


1/6 Ben Garrod shows how bone can support animals that are both minuscule and massive. 

2/6 Ben Garrod discovers how the skeleton has adapted for vertebrates to move on land

3/6 Ben Garrod finds out how the skeleton has allowed vertebrates to take to the air

4/6 Ben delves into the ways in which bone has evolved to help vertebrates sense the world.

5/6 Ben uncovers the secrets of how vertebrates capture and devour their food.

6/6 Ben Garrod seeks out the big part that bones can play in reproduction.
